overview: A man calls out from the other side of the door and orders her ot open it. he isn't going anywhere. Natalie (Lena Paul) bits her nails nervously, unsure of what to do before finally letting out a sight and opening the door to face him. An intimidating repo man called Tony (Domenic Kane) is there to colect what he can to compensate creditors for her student loan debt. After grabbing everything of value he could finde, he takes stock of what's inside his duffel bags and rearks it won't be enough to cover what she owes. He notices the car parked in her driveway and Natalies begs him not to take it. "Well," he says slowly, "There is one other possesion I could take instead."
title: Possessive
